settings.heroimage_paragraph_text: Built your rep but still duct-taping ops together? We see you. Juggling suppliers, specs, and shipping dramas isn’t scaling – it’s surviving. When your clients expect perfection, you need a backend that delivers it. That’s where we come in.

settings.cta_heading_text: Get print-ready in days, not months.
settings.cta_paragraph_text: As a Garage Distributor, you get white-label fulfilment (your name, our machines), every major print method under one roof, and trade-only pricing that keeps your margins intact. We move fast, speak fluent mockup, and won’t murder your artwork with bad crops or blurry prints. Promise.

settings.contact_form_tagline_text: Let’s make some killer merch together.
settings.contact_form_paragraph_text: Drop us your details and we’ll get you set up to access trade rates, tools, and the production muscle behind Australia’s best-kept merch. This is where the good stuff starts.

settings.timeline_item_paragraph_text: Our crew will assess your business details to understand your client types, capabilities, and how our setup can support what you do.
We’ll jump on a call to run through your needs, our print and manufacturing capabilities, and how we can align for best-fit results.
We run a test job to make sure the design, specs, and finish are all 100% spot-on. This is your chance to tweak, approve, and feel fully confident before we scale things up.
Once your account’s set up, you’ll unlock access to trade rates, quoting tools, spec sheets, live order tracking, and priority support – all in one place.
You've got a crew in your corner. We’ll stay in step with your growth, help you streamline where needed, and be ready to support you with whatever’s next.

settings.timeline_paragraph_text: We keep the process lean, clear, and fast, so you can spend less time on admin and more time keeping your clients happy.

settings.contact_map_tagline_text: Wanna see where the magic happens?
settings.contact_map_paragraph_text: We’re open for drop-ins during biz hours, so come talk shop, check out our setup, or chat through your next big idea.
